Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1183 EAST CANVASBACK DRIVE, TERRE HAUTE, Indiana, 47802, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Hallador Energy Co is a coal mining company with operations in Indiana, USA, and it is part of the electric power generation industry. The company also has equity interests in oil and gas exploration companies in both Indiana and Michigan. The company sells the majority of its coal to large scrubbed coal-fired power plants in Indiana. The operating business segments includes two Oaktown underground mines located in southwestern Indiana.
